result.arabic_text: وَقِيلِهِۦ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
result.translation: Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah), yaraganyiye Imana yiwe Rurema Allah, bitewe n’uko abantu bamuhakanye bivuye inyuma, ati: “Ewe Mana yanje Rurema Allah! Mu vy’ukuri, aba bantu ntibakwemera Wewe hamwe n’ubutumwa Wandungikanye”;
